text: Mohammed Kamal el-Shennawi (, ; December 26, 1921 – August 22, 2011) was an Egyptian film and television actor, director and producer. He is the maternal uncle of Egyptian American actor Haythem Noor and Amr Youssri . == Filmography == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! International title ! Original title ! Role !
